thread.title: Photos | Pope Francis washes and kisses feet of 12 women prisoners in pre-Easter ritual
thread.title_full: Photos | Pope Francis washes and kisses feet of 12 women prisoners in pre-Easter ritual | Hindustan Times

author: @httweets
title: Photos | Pope Francis washes and kisses feet of 12 women prisoners in pre-Easter ritual
text: Photos | Pope Francis washes and kisses feet of 12 women prisoners in pre-Easter ritual 03:35 PM IST - Pope Francis performed the "Washing of the Feet" of inmates during a private visit as part of Holy Thursday, during Easter celebrations. 1 / 6 03:35 PM IST Pope Francis washed and kissed the feet of 12 women inmates at a Rome prison during a Holy Thursday ritual meant to emphasize his vocation of service and humility. (REUTERS) 2 / 6 03:35 PM IST The 87-year-old Francis performed the ritual from his wheelchair after recent ailments have compounded his mobility problems. (via REUTERS) 3 / 6 03:35 PM IST Pope Francis kisses the feet of an inmate of the female section of Rebibbia Prison during a Holy Thursday ritual, in Rome, Italy.(via REUTERS) 4 / 6 03:35 PM IST In this photo, Pope Francis can be seen being welcomed at the Rebibbia prison for women in Rome where he performed the "Washing of the Feet" of inmates during a private visit as part of Holy Thursday, during Easter celebrations.(AFP) 5 / 6 03:35 PM IST Many of the women wept as Francis washed their feet, gently pouring water over one bared foot and patting it dry with a small towel. (via REUTERS) 6 / 6 03:35 PM IST
